message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the market conditions.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price.  While your offer is appreciated,  $950,000 undervalues the product significantly.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,050,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,000,000 for the product. This is my final offer, but I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to come down further.
